history.p: Pigerne inde i Skoven was originally composed for the play Sanct Hansaftenspil (text by Adam Oehlenschlaeger ) in 1913. The melody was later reworked.

bibl.author: Bengt Johnsson
bibl.title: Strømninger i den danske folkelige sang
Ord och bild

expression.title: Version for women's choir and piano
